title: Notification background
description:
Notification background, You can set up a reminder notification wallpaper by selecting an image or color to use as a wallpaper. 

## Enter notification background setting menu 
'Reminder' app> upper left menu> 'Reminder settings'> 'Alert background'.

title: Receive Special Offers and Newsletters
description:
Receive Special Offers and Newsletters, You will be redirected to the consent management screen for receiving newsletters and advertisements sent by Samsung. 
You will receive news about special offers, products, services, etc., from Samsung and its partners via email, text messages, and push notifications.

1. Start the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Samsung Account' > 'Security and Privacy Protection' menu.
3. Here you can find the 'Receive Special Offers and Newsletters' menu.

title: Abbreviated word
description:
Abbreviated word, This item manages the shortcut list of Samsung Keyboard. Shortcuts are the ability to recommend long sentences connected to short words when you enter them. 

##Here's how you can set Text shortcuts:
1. Run 'Samsung Keyboard' > Select 'Settings' icon from toolbar > Select 'Text shortcuts' here.

title: Voice input
description:
Voice input, It is an item that specifies multiple modes of operation of the voice input function of the Samsung Keyboard.   
 -If you select Samsung voice input, Samsung voice input will work when you press the voice input icon.  
 -If you select Google voice input, Google voice input will work when you press the voice input icon.  
 -If you select Do not set, you will turn off voice input.  
 -If you select Install Offline Language Pack, you can download the language you want to use offline in advance.
 -  If you choose to hide unpleasant words, some these words will be recognized as asterisks (**).
 
##You can enable Voice input in the following way:
1. Run 'Samsung Keyboard' > Select 'Settings' icon from toolbar > Here you'll find 'Voice input' option.

title: High contrast keyboard
description:
High contrast keyboard, This is a setting that prevents the Samsung Keyboard from being displayed in high contrast. High contrast keyboards display keyboards in contrasting colors so that low vision people can easily recognize keyboards.

##To enable/disable High contrast keyboard:
1. Run 'Samsung Keyboard' > Select 'Settings' icon from toolbar > You'll find 'High contrast keyboard', enable/disable it.

title: Personal information management policy
description:
Personal information management policy, You can check the details of Bixby's Privacy Policy here:

1. Please go to the 'Settings' app.
2. Find and select 'Advanced features' in the menu.
3. Select 'Bixby'.
4. Select 'Privacy Notice' within 'Bixby'.

title: Initialize Samsung Kids
description:
Initialize Samsung Kids, Initialize settings for Samsung Kids. 

Run Samsung Kids> More View Options> Select Settings> Unlock> Select 'Reset Samsung Kids'.

title: Add Samsung Kids to Apps screen
description:
Add Samsung Kids to Apps screen, Add/remove the Samsung Kids icon to the Apps screen.

Run Samsung Kids> More View Options> Select Settings> Unlock> Select 'Add Samsung Kids to Apps screen'.

title: Child protection locking system
description:
Child protection locking system, Change the lock method of Samsung Kids. 

(Device lock or separate PIN CODE) 
Run Samsung 'Kids'> More View Options> Select 'Settings'>'Unlock'> Select 'Lock type for Parental controls'.

title: Samsung Keyboard
description:
Samsung Keyboard, The Samsung Keyboard menu allows you to set various keyboard formats, change keyboard modes and languages, adjust the size and transparency of the keyboard, layout, and offers various other setting options.

1. Launch the 'Settings' app.
2. Select 'General' > 'Default Keyboard and Additional Keyboard Settings' menu.
3. You can find the 'Samsung Keyboard' menu here.

title: Settings - Security & privacy - Find My device
description:
Settings - Security & privacy - Find My device, Enable Find My Device. You can track and control your lost or stolen device by visiting smartthingsfind.samsung.com. You can also find the location of wearable devices connected to your device. 
It provides functions such as making a sound, locking, tracking location, deleting data, and extending battery life. 
And enable the Stolen Device Protection feature. If you verify your identity when changing sensitive information settings, you can prevent others from accessing your apps or data if your phone is stolen.

1. Launch the 'Settings' app on your device.
2. Select the 'Security & Privacy' menu.
3. Here you can find the 'Lost Device Protection' menu.

title: About S Pen
description:
About S Pen, You can rename the S Pen. You can check the model name and software version of the S Pen. 

##How to check S Pen information
1. Launch the 'Settings' app on your Galaxy device.
2. Select the 'Advanced features' menu.
3. Here you can find the 'S Pen' menu.
4. Select 'About S Pen'.

Here, you can also update the S Pen software and check it's regulatory information.

title: Lock screen
description:
Lock screen, Protect the terminal by providing screen lock setting and fingerprint setting.

1. Run the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Security and Personal Information Protection' menu.
3. You can find the 'Lock Screen' menu here.

If you select an item, you can select the desired screen lock method. You can choose between PIN, pattern, and password, and if you want to use biometrics, you can also recognize fingerprints or faces.
Enter the information you need according to the way you choose.

title: Notification
description:
Notification, For notifications sent from the Galaxy store, you can select sound and notification method, and whether notification contents are displayed on the lock screen.

 1. Select the Galaxy store -> menu tab and select the cogwheel icon.
 2. Select the notification menu.
 * Important update notifications of Galaxy Store cannot be turned off. In order to quickly deal with security or important problems of individual apps, it supports a function called important update to notify users of the function's operation.

title: Find nearby devices
description:
Find nearby devices, Sets up your device to search for nearby devices to connect to.

1. Open the Settings app on your device.
2. Select the 'Connections' > 'Other connection settings' menu.
3. Here you can find the 'Find nearby devices' menu.

When you enable this option, it automatically scans the surroundings for nearby devices and notify you. This allows your device to scan its surroundings on its own and notify you if there are any connectable devices available.

title: Protect your stolen device
description:
Protect your stolen device, It is a good idea to enable the Stolen Device Protection feature on your device. When you change sensitive information settings, you can prevent others from accessing your apps or data if your phone is stolen by verifying your identity.

1. Run the ‘Settings’ app on your device.
2. Select the ‘Security and Privacy’ menu.
3. Select the ‘Lost device protection’ menu.
4. Here you can find the ‘Protection from stolen devices’ menu.

title: Now brief
description:
Now brief, This feature recommends useful content and various tasks as a briefing to suit your daily schedule.

1. Run the ‘Settings’ app.
2. Select the ‘Galaxy AI’ menu.
3. Here you can find the ‘Now brief’ menu.

title: Content to be briefed on
description:
Content to be briefed on, Now brief allows you to select the type of content you want to see.
Content related to the selected category will be displayed and content from unselected categories will not be available.

1. Run the ‘Settings’ app.
2. Select the ‘Galaxy AI > Now brief’ menu.
3. Here you can select the category of ‘content to be briefed’.

title: Display Now Brief even if your phone is locked
description:
Display Now Brief even if your phone is locked, You can set whether to display Now Brief when your phone is locked.

1. Run the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Galaxy AI> Now Brief' menu
3. You can find the "Show Now Brief" menu here even if your cell phone is locked.

title: Audio eraser
description:
Audio eraser, The audio eraser feature is a function that edits the audio in the video as desired, and can be edited cleanly by adjusting the volume of various sounds such as voice and wind sound. 

1. Run the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Galaxy AI' menu.
3. You can find the 'Audio Eraser' menu here.

Also, in the Gallery and Video Player apps, it automatically reduces background noise during content playback, allowing you to focus on the video and audio more immersive.

title: Reply to notifications or recommend action buttons
description:
Reply to notifications or recommend action buttons, When expanding the notification card, you can display suggested actions and reply functions.

1. Run the ‘Settings’ app.
2. Select the ‘Notifications’ > ‘Advanced Settings’ menu.
3. Here you can find the ‘Reply to notification or recommend action button’ menu.

title: The ability to use your phone's high-end camera on your tablet
description:
The ability to use your phone's high-end camera on your tablet, You can use your phone's high-end camera on your tablet.

## Usage Procedure
- Automatically connects when searching for a nearby device (phone or tablet)
- When running a camera-related app (Meet, Zoom, etc.), it operates as a phone camera.
Connected devices and functions can be turned on/off through Quick panel.

## Function operation conditions (Precondition)
- Bluetooth and Wi-Fi On required
- ‘Settings’ > ‘Connection between devices’ > ‘Camera sharing’ function must be turned on
- Requires login with same Samsung account

title: Sort and filter notifications
description:
Sort and filter notifications, You can sort the notifications displayed in the notification window by 'Time' or 'Importance'.

1. Launch the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Notifications' > 'Sort and filter notifications' menu.
3. Select an item to change the 'Sort notifications' order to 'Time' or 'Importance'.

Here you can categorize advertisements, old notifications, background activity, and minimized notifications and group them separately at the bottom of the notification shade.
1. Advertisements: Categorize notifications that contain advertisements. (Korean only)
2. Old notifications: Categorize notifications that were received a few days ago.
3. Background activity: Categorize notifications that show apps running in the background.
4. Minimized notifications: Categorize notifications that are set to minimized in the notification category settings.

title: Repeat notification
description:
Repeat notification, You can repeat notifications from selected apps.
If you clear notifications from the notification window, the notifications will not be repeated.

1. Run the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Notification' > 'Advanced settings' menu.
3. You can find the 'Repeat notifications' menu here.

You can change detailed settings (app selection, repeat time, vibration when sound is played, etc.) by selecting an item.

title: Keyword-based notification light effect color setting
description:
Keyword-based notification light effect color setting, When a notification pop-up occurs with a title that matches a word or name I registered, it displays the notification in a specific color.

1. Run the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Notification' > 'Notification pop-up style' menu, and then select a brief view.
3. Here, you can find the 'Keyword-based notification light effect color setting' menu.

title: Add light notification effect
description:
Add light notification effect, When a notification pop-up occurs, you can select various light effects on the edge of the screen. 

1. Run the 'Settings' app
2. Select 'Notification' > 'Notification pop-up style' menu.

Here, you can select 'Light notification effect'.

title: Show lock screen sound notifications only
description:
Show lock screen sound notifications only, You can set whether to show only sound notifications on the lock screen.

1. Run the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Notification' > 'Lock screen' menu.
3. Here you can find the 'Show only sound notifications' menu.

title: Management Status
description:
Management Status, You can check the management status of the device.

1. Run the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Device Care' menu.
3. Here you can find the 'Management Status' menu.

In this menu, you can check the optimization status and apps that have been switched to ultra-power saving mode.

title: Verify your identity
description:
Verify your identity, When changing sensitive information settings on a phone that has identity verification turned on, biometrics and delayed secure access are required, even if you know your PIN, pattern, or password.
This protection applies anywhere that is not set up as a secure location, such as your home or work.

1. Run the ‘Settings’ app on your device.
2. Select the ‘Security and Privacy’ menu.
3. Select the ‘Lost device protection’ menu.
4. Select the ‘Stolen Device Protection’ menu.
5. Here you can find the ‘Verify your identity’ menu.

title: Personal data intelligence
description:
Personal data intelligence, Personal data intelligence is a function that suggests useful functions such as adding calendar events or sending messages based on usage patterns and text analysis.

1. Run the ‘Settings’ app.
2. Select the ‘Security and Privacy’ menu.
3. Select the ‘Other Personal Information Settings’ menu.
4. Here you can find the ‘Personal Data Intelligence’ menu.

By selecting the item, you can turn on or off the recommendation function provided by personal data intelligence for each app.
The data used in this feature is not stored anywhere other than your device to protect your privacy.

title: Save selfie without flipping horizontally
description:
Save selfie without flipping horizontally, You can save selfies and selfie videos without flipping them horizontally.
Camera settings > Save selfies without flipping

title: Galaxy Avatar
description:
Galaxy Avatar, Galaxy Avatar is a cartoon-style 3D character that can represent me in digital space. I can use my own avatar to make video calls, send stickers, create profile pictures, and more.

1. Launch the 'Settings' app.
2. Select 'Advanced features' > 'Galaxy Avatar' menu.
3. Here, you can create an avatar and start various experiences using the avatar.

title: Now bar
description:
Now bar, The Now bar on the lock screen allows users to check real-time update information of the app currently in use and provides useful information based on the current situation.

1. Launch the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Lock screen and AOD' menu.
3. Here you can find the 'Now bar' menu.

You can select each item to choose the information and apps displayed on the Now bar, such as music, modes, and routines.

title: Read the main content
description:
Read the main content , Through the Browsing Assist menu's read-aloud feature for key content, you can listen to a summary of a webpage or gather and listen to the main content of the latest articles on news sites.

After extracting the main content based on the body of the webpage, the extracted key content is read aloud to help users easily understand the webpage's content. However, the read-aloud feature for key content may be limited on very short webpages or paid sites.

You can activate the read-aloud feature for key content by running the "Browsing Assist" icon, and detailed settings can be checked under Internet Menu > Settings > Browsing Assist > Read Aloud Key Content.

title: Lock screen notification
description:
Lock screen notification, You can set whether to display 'Show notifications', 'Notification style', and 'Show only sound notifications' on the lock screen.

1. Run the 'Settings' app.
2. Select the 'Notification' > 'Lock screen' menu.
3. From here, you can choose whether to display notifications on the lock screen and select the 'Notification style' as 'Card', 'Icon', or 'Dot'.
   You can also change whether to 'Show only sound notifications'.

title: Set summary of recorded content converted to text
description:
Set summary of recorded content converted to text, You can change the summary settings for text-converted recordings in Text Conversion Assist.

Follow the steps below to check the summary settings for the text conversion assist.

1. Open Voice Recording App
2. Run voice recording settings
3. Execute text conversion assist
4. Run a summary of recorded content converted into text

## Set whether to use the summary
1. Turn the summary of the converted recordings on/off

# # # Set the summary by on-device processing
1. Turn the summary of the converted recordings on > Turn on the data processing option on the device

## Set the method of summarizing to the server
1. Turn the summary of the converted recordings on > Turn on the data processing option on the device

title: Bubble emoji
description:
Bubble emoji, When sending a message, you can receive emoji recommendations that match the sentence you entered to decorate the message bubble.

## Using Bubble Emojis
1. Enter the conversation room and enter a message.
2. Select the speech bubble icon displayed in the input window.
3. Choose the desired combination from the recommended emoji combinations and send it.
* If you don't like any of the combinations, select the refresh icon.
* If you don't want to use it, select the close icon.

## Turning off Bubble Emojis
Message App > More > Settings > Additional Settings > Bubble Emojis OFF

title: Show notification pop-up even when the screen is off on the cover screen
description:
Show notification pop-up even when the screen is off on the cover screen, You can set whether to show notification pop-ups even when the screen is off on the cover screen.

1. Run the 'Settings' app on your mobile phone.
2. Select the 'Notification' > 'Cover screen' menu.
3. Here, you can find the 'Show notification pop-ups even when the screen is off' menu.
